tags.name: scene
tags.description: custom tag as root node in the entity tree structure

tags.name: camera
tags.description: custom tag used to represent the Camera entity in the scene.

attributes.name: order
attributes.description:
order determines the rendering order of cameras.
 Cameras with a higher order value are rendered on top of those with a lower order value.

attributes.name: viewPort
attributes.description: viewPort defines the visible area size. render elements outside the viewport will be clipped.

tags.name: UIButton
tags.description: A custom tag used to represent 2D UI Button

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: A unique identifier for the button.

attributes.name: className
attributes.description: CSS class names to apply to the button.

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: Inline CSS styles to apply to the button.

attributes.name: onClick
attributes.description: rust function to execute when the button is clicked.

tags.name: UIContainer
tags.description: A custom tag used to represent 2D UI Text

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: A unique identifier for the button.

attributes.name: class
attributes.description: CSS class names to apply to the button.

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: Inline CSS styles to apply to the button.

tags.name: UIHead1
tags.description: A custom tag used to represent 2D UI Text

tags.name: Statechart
tags.description: A custom tag used to represent herichrical finite state machine for complex orchestration logics
